# O3

```{python}

import pandas as pd
import sys
sys.path.append('../..')
import modpollution

df = modpollution.as_df_csv("../../modpollution/data/data_m.csv")
df = modpollution.extraire_donnees_depart(df,'HERAULT')
df = modpollution.extraire_polluant(df,'O3')
modpollution.plotpollline(df,color='nom_station',titre='Concentration en O3 par stations')
df_j = modpollution.as_df_csv("../../modpollution/data/data_j.csv")
df_j = modpollution.extraire_donnees_depart(df_j,'HERAULT')
df_j = modpollution.extraire_polluant(df_j,'O3')
modpollution.plotpollline(df_j,color='nom_station',titre='Concentration en O3 par stations')

```
